body:
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. ------=_NextPart_000_001F_01C139D1.9C437820 Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1" Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable I'm trying to install Radiance on my machine running Redhat 7.1, and I'm = not having any success with it. HAs anyone heard of changes made to the = system that might cause compiler errors? It seems to fail with about = half of the executable files I expect it to make. I've made the = appropriate changes in the makeall file to point to the X11 directories, = so I'm fairly confident thats not the problem. Does anyone have and = suggestions, or perhaps know where I might find a pre-compiled version = for Linux OS? Thanks, Robert Graham ------=_NextPart_000_001F_01C139D1.9C437820 Content-Type: text/html; charset="iso-8859-1" Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
I'm trying to install Radiance on my = machine=20 running Redhat 7.1, and I'm not having any success with it.  HAs = anyone=20 heard of changes made to the system that might cause compiler = errors?  It=20 seems to fail with about half of the executable files I expect it to = make. =20 I've made the appropriate changes in the makeall file to point to the = X11=20 directories, so I'm fairly confident thats not the problem.   = Does=20 anyone have and suggestions, or perhaps know where I might find a = pre-compiled=20 version for Linux OS?
 
Thanks,
 
Robert = Graham
------=_NextPart_000_001F_01C139D1.9C437820-- ___ Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2001-September/000032.html).
